banrepcultural-skin-desc: Modern version of MonoBook with fresh look and many usability improvements
prefs-banrepcultural-enable-banrepcultur: Over the next few years, we will be gradually updating the Banrepcultural skin. Legacy Banrepcultural will allow you to view the old version of Banrepcultural (as of December 2019). To learn more about the updates, go to our [[mw:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
banrepcultural-opt-out-tooltip: Change your settings to go back to the old look of the skin (legacy Banrepcultural)
banrepcultural.css: /* All CSS here will be loaded for users of the Banrepcultural skin */
banrepcultural.js: /* All JavaScript here will be loaded for users of the Banrepcultural skin */
